The applicable rate of interest shall be as mentioned in Clause 23.6.4 of Article which states 'Interest rate shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25%"_ The footnote specifies that 'the Authority shall declare the list of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks on 1st September every calendar year based on the Balance Sheet size as declared in their Annual reports. The year Marginal Cost of funds based Lending Rate (MCLR) of the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks shall be taken at the start of every Quarter. 2 _ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks along with their one year MCLR (rate of interest), applicable as on 1st April, 2021. 3_ The rates for 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks are as below: Sr. No. Bank' s Name Year MCLR in % Rate applicable for the period 01.04.
